DarkMouse::

She saw the bots enter and did what she felt was right. She turned on 
the PA system," Welcome to the Hotel Cybertron. Please make 
yourselves at home and follow the rules of the house. No spiting, 
fighting, killing the other bots in the fortress, no messing around 
in the labs because that's what your rooms are for, no telling the 
boss you don't like his new armor and above all, no hurting rodents 
while staying here. Have a nice day." 
She turned of the system and fell out of her chair laughing.

> ::Crater::
> 
> Crater shrugs. "I have no idea."
> 
> He looks around, not very impressed with these bots so far.
